data.title: Ally Myers, PA
data.text:
Ally is a certified physician assistant (PA-C) working with inpatient cardiovascular patients at the Orlando Health Heart and Vascular Institute. She works closely with cardiologists and treats a variety of heart patients. Her skills include:

Evaluating acute and chronic cardiovascular patients

Electrocardiogram interpretation

Telemetry monitoring and interpretation

Patient assessment

Cardiac medication dosing

Developing treatment plans

Patient education

Managing patients before and after operations

As someone whose mother and father are both nurses, Ally understands the importance of providing her patients with quality and compassionate care. She finds joy in watching her patients’ health improve knowing that she helped better their quality of life.

Ally’s Training

As an undergraduate, Ally studied biology and nutritional sciences at the University of Florida in Gainesville. She graduated with honors from Nova Southeastern University in Jacksonville, Florida, with her master’s in physician assistant studies (MPAS).

About Ally

Ally is certified with the National Commission on Certification of Physician Assistants. She is a member of the American Academy of Physician Associates and Florida Academy of Physician Assistants.

Outside of work, Ally likes to travel and spend time with her family. She also is passionate about maintaining a healthy lifestyle.
